thread.title: Innovate in Brasil venue

author: The Telegraph
title: Innovate in Brasil venue
text: Find out more about Innovate in Brasil » Jumeirah Carlton Tower is a luxurious five-star hotel in London, located in the heart of the capital's central area. Located just off Sloane Street, Jumeirah Carlton Tower is within easy access to Underground lines via Knightsbridge station, London’s major airports and the Eurostar. A preferential bedroom rate has been negotiated at the hotel for those attending. To book your room at the Jumeirah Carlton Tower please email reservations@hotelconferencecompany.com Should you require accommodation we would advise you to book as early as possible as the hotel has advised us it will be busy at this time. Jumeirah Carlton Tower One Cadogan Place, Knightsbridge, London SW1X 9PY Innovate in Brasil is an invitation only conference. To make an inquiry please email Soosyan.Eng@telegraph.co.uk
